page.title: 19A Night Out in Strathmiglo
page.content: The Strathmiglo Inn is being restored in the hope of capturing even more than at present,the images of the 18th century. The restoration will also include an enlargement of the premises.Many local people do not use the Inn.They find it expensive both for eating and drinking. Both The Royal Hotel and The Tavern are popular with locals.The Tavern,once The Railway Tavern because of its proximity to what until the 1960's was Strathmiglo Station,has just opened a new restaurant which has been named the Signal Box, for obvious reasons. Opposite The Royal Hotel at the east end of the High Street is a house with an arched pend above which it says IM IB 16.It is said this building was once a stable and travellers changing horses may have rested in the Royal Hotel.
